option1: Questions 800 would you rather questions the only list youll need! would you rather questions 800 would you rather questions the only list youll need! updated on oct 20, 2022 reviewed by julianne cantarella, msw, lsw , certified relationship coach reviewed by julianne cantarella, msw, lsw , certified relationship coach julianne is certified relationship coach and licensed social worker. she has 15 years of experience in matchmaking industry. juliannes expertise as a relationship and dating coach has been highlighted through her articles in your tango, northjersey.com, talk of the town magazine and vue magazine to name a few. learn more about our review board july 3, 2020 would you rather questions are more than just a party game! by asking such questions you can get to know your family and friends up, close, and personal. you can try such questions on anyone! from parents to your romantic partner, friends, colleagues, and even a kid at home. obviously, you cannot ask the same set of questions to everyone. you have to know which question to ask to whom. such questions liven up the party and whats more, we are often amazed at the answers we give to others. a unique side of you might be revealed that you couldnt have guessed it yourself. and this is true for those who you ask! you can play this game in a house party
option2: Just get cozy with your partner asking each other in turns. hey, we have got you covered! we will give you 800 would you rather questions under separate categories! and we promise you that your search ends here . after reading this piece you wont have to look anywhere else!
